name: #16 Nakula
description:
One of Pandava brothers and the twin of Sadewa. Nakula is a master swordsman, expert in medicine and skilled in the art of riding. He was born to Madrim who invoked Aswins the twin gods of medicine.

In the Great War, Nakula is a fierce warrior, he defeated Dursasana but spared his life, destroys Shalya's chariot, trashes Sengkuni and kills the sons of Karna. Nakula only defeated by Duryodhana and Karna. Nakula and his twin brother, Sadewa was sent to confront raging King Shalya, the brother of the twin's mother, Madrim. In which the old King tell them that the only one able to defeat him and Chandrabirawa is their brother, Yudhistira.
